title: React Hooks Explained: useEffect and useState
description:
Infarena is a Canadian-based platform designed to facilitate seamless interactions among users. It serves as a hub for trading goods, sharing reviews, participating in discussions, and listing small businesses for free. Additionally, the platform supports job postings and property reviews, empowering users to make informed decisions.

The primary challenge was to develop a user-friendly platform that could handle multiple functionalities—such as trading, reviewing, and business listings—while maintaining an engaging and intuitive interface.
author: Umoren Emem Olushola

title: Getting Started with Data Cleaning in Excel and Python
description:
Data cleaning is the first and one of the most critical steps in data analysis. It involves identifying and correcting errors or inconsistencies in datasets to ensure accurate analysis.

In this article, we’ll cover practical steps for cleaning data using both Excel functions like TRIM, REMOVE DUPLICATES, and filters, and Python libraries such as pandas. By the end, you’ll understand how to prepare a raw dataset for meaningful insights.
author: Umoren Emem Olushola

title: Responsive Design: Building for All Screens
description:
Responsive web design ensures that your site looks and works well on all devices—from mobile phones to desktops. It involves fluid layouts, flexible images, and media queries to create a seamless experience.

Learn the core principles of responsive design and how to implement them using modern CSS frameworks like Tailwind and media queries.
author: Umoren Emem Olushola

title: Exploratory Data Analysis with Pandas and Matplotlib
description:
Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) is a crucial step in understanding your dataset before applying any models. With Python libraries like pandas and matplotlib, you can quickly summarize, visualize, and find patterns in your data.

This article will walk you through how to perform EDA on a sample dataset, including descriptive stats, group analysis, and basic plotting.
author: Umoren Emem Olushola
